mapper.select: with T01 as ( SELECT D.id, D.request_id, D.lot_no, ifnull(L.model, D.part_no) part_no, D.qty, D.created_at, D.updated_at FROM pih_inventory_data D left join lots L on D.lot_no = L.lot_no where 1 = 1 and request_id = #{requestId} ), T02 as ( select T01.* , M.classified from T01 left join model M on T01.part_no = M.name ) select * from T02 order by T02.lot_no asc
